cards.name: Planetary Decimation
cards.rulesText: Deal massive unblockable damage to every adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Invincible Grip
cards.rulesText: Grab a target; they cannot move or attack you until they discard 2 cards, then drag them 1 space.

cards.name: Skyquake Crash
cards.rulesText: Leap anywhere; landing deals 3 damage to all figures there and knocks them back 1.

cards.name: Merciless Beatdown
cards.rulesText: Make three separate 3-damage strikes; if any hit, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Callous Calculation
cards.rulesText: Rearrange up to 3 figures within 3 spaces; each moved figure takes 1 damage.

cards.name: Cruel Lesson
cards.rulesText: Enemy discards 2 random cards and takes 2 damage; you may move 2 spaces.

cards.name: Combat Mastery
cards.rulesText: Until your next turn, you gain +2 attack and defense on all rolls.

cards.name: Focused Counter
cards.rulesText: Cancel an enemy special; immediately move adjacent and strike for 3 damage.

cards.name: Tactical Feint
cards.rulesText: Swap places with a figure within 4 spaces; that figure is stunned.

cards.name: Subjugate the Weak
cards.rulesText: All enemies with 3 or fewer cards discard 1 or lose 2 movement next turn.

cards.name: Relentless Pursuit
cards.rulesText: Move up to 5 spaces toward an enemy and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Warrior's Intimidation
cards.rulesText: Target enemy suffers –2 attack until your next turn; you move 1 space.

cards.name: Universal Conquest
cards.rulesText: Signature: Strike any 2 enemies for 4 damage each, moving adjacent to each in turn.

cards.name: Tilting the Battlefield
cards.rulesText: Rotate any board tile or obstacle 90°; figures moved take 1 damage from debris.
